name: Nightfall (itch) (kreivi)
description:
You are having nightmare where you endlessly fall and only way to limit descent speed is to SCREAM!

Controls
  • Microphone input - Brake falling speed 
  • Move left - Left / A / D-Pad Left
  • Move right - Right / D / D-Pad Right

This game was done as entry to Godot Wild Jam #55 where theme was Dreams. Jam ran from March 10th 2023 March 19th 2023 (9 days) and active development time was something around 15 hours.
